text: The Chevrolet Agile is a Subcompact car made by General Motors under Chevrolet from 2009 to 2016. == History and Features == The Chevrolet Agile was based on the GPiX concept shown at the SÃ£o Paulo Auto Show in 2008. the Agile was then launched in 2009. its offered only as a 5-door Hatchback(even though the related Chevrolet Montana made from 2010 to 2021 uses the Agile's front and chassis) the car is based on the 1990s Chevrolet Corsa and has a 1.4 liter both gasoline and ethanol engine with a 5-speed manual transmission it was improved in 2013. == Markets == The Chevrolet Agile was sold mainly in South America specifically in Brazil Uruguay Argentina and Paraguay. == Discontinuation == The production of The Chevrolet Agile ended in 2016 and was replaced by the Chevrolet Onix. == References == Agile Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Chevrolet Agile
